section.heading: Plans and reports to be made available to the public.

para.text: Agencies shall make all ADA plans and reports required under this unit available on their websites and shall provide copies to the public upon request.

The Office of Disability Rights and the Office for the Deaf, Deafblind, and Hard of Hearing shall make all plans and reports required under this unit available on its website and shall provide copies to the public upon request.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 23-152: § 3 of D.C. Law 23-152 provided that the change made to this section by § 2(d) of D.C. Law 23-152 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

Section 7191 of D.C. Act 24-159 repealed section 3 of D.C. Law 23-152 removing the applicability provision impacting this section. Therefore the amendment of this section by Law 23-152 has been implemented.

Section 7191 of D.C. Law 24-45 repealed section 3 of D.C. Law 23-152 removing the applicability provision impacting this section. Therefore the amendment of this section by Law 23-152 has been implemented.
